messages.subject: Sandra in Saskatoon
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/1/03 2:13:37 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/1/03 2:13:37 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< This is Kirby and my mother called here at home to tell me to write to you
all and say She is haveing alot of fun and things are going real well!


Kirby. >>

Thanks for letting us know Kirby!! I was thinking about her yesterday and
had a really good feeling, like she was going to have a great trip. It's nice
to know it wasn't just wishful thinking. :)

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: Sandra in Saskatoon
messages.msgSnippet: This is Kirby and my mother called here at home to tell me to write to you all and say She is haveing alot of fun and things are going real well! Kirby.
messages.messageBody:
This is Kirby and my mother called here at home to tell me to write to you
all and say She is haveing alot of fun and things are going real well!


Kirby.
